feed.title: ShinyTracker
feed.subtitle: Lists and displays detected changes on the RSI "Progress Tracker"

entry.title: Progress Tracker Delta - 2022-10-26
entry.summary: Progress Tracker Delta 479 deliverables listed | 2022-09-28 => 2022-10-26 There were 90 modifications, 1 removals, and 2 additions in this update. Please note that not all removals are intentional; there is currently a bug with how time is entered on the Progress Tracker that can cause deliverables to disappear.

entry.title: Scheduled Deliverables - 2022-10-26
entry.summary: There are currently 88 scheduled deliverables being worked on by 41 teams
